pr_title: Jakartified.master - rebasing master on top of 3.x jakartification

timeline.message:
Adopt Jackson 2.10.1 (#4339)

* Updated Jackson to 2.10.1

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Query parameters were not included in netty URI (#4393)

* Query parameters were not included in netty URI

Signed-off-by: Jorge Bescos Gascon <jorge.bescos.gascon@oracle.com>

Use standard pom.xml structure (#4414)

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Minor modification on documentation chapter (#4408)

* Minor modification on documentation

Signed-off-by: tvallin <thibault.vallin@oracle.com>

Use request scope ClientProperties.READ_TIMEOUT in Jetty && Netty (#4415)

Fixes 4405

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Fix the OSGi Functional Tests for JDK 11

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Allow to use HeaderDelegateProvider to parse the response MediaType

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Add new interfaces (PreInvocationInterceptor, PostInvocationInterceptor, and InvocationBuilderListener) documentation (#4411)

* Add new PreInvocationInterceptor, PostInvocationInterceptor, and InvocationBuilderListener interfaces documentation

Signed-off-by: tvallin <thibault.vallin@oracle.com>

Updated GF, Jetty, Mimepull, Moxy, Yasson dependencies (#4425)

* Updated GF, Jetty, Mimepull, Moxy, Yasson dependencies

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Make sure the RX invoker gets ExecutorService from ExecutorServiceProvider (#4429)

Signed-off-by: Jan Supol <jan.supol@oracle.com>

Support jdk15 (#4426)

Signed-off-by: Jorge Bescos Gascon <jorge.bescos.gascon@oracle.com>

jakartification: disable jetty plugin

Signed-off-by: Maxim Nesen <maxim.nesen@oracle.com>

jakartification: disable jetty plugin

Signed-off-by: Maxim Nesen <maxim.nesen@oracle.com>
